Coltrane application
=======================
The purpose of this application is to incorporate a blog system in every space that the user creates. This means that each personal space will have his own blog system. Using the application :ref:`FriendyControl <friendycontrol_index>` you can control who can watch your space.

..module:: coltrane

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   coltrane_views
